title: Target Buyers
description: Now let's identify the specific types of buyers who are most likely to hire your solution. These are the people who experience the jobs and trigger events you've identified.

placeholders.buyerTypePlaceholder: e.g., Overwhelmed agency owners who want to scale but are stuck doing client work

tooltips.buyerTypeTooltip: Describe a specific type of person who experiences the jobs and trigger events you've identified

examples: Solopreneurs who are working 60+ hours a week and struggling to keep up with client demands
E-commerce store owners who are seeing high cart abandonment rates
Course creators who have expertise but struggle with marketing their offerings
Small business owners who are frustrated with inconsistent cash flow
